entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:58 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. Rain or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain in the morning. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or snow. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain. High 7. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
